title: Did USPS Tell Americans to Send Mail-In Ballots 2 Weeks in Advance?
subtitle: The USPS does recommend requesting ballots at least 15 days in advance and mailing them at least a week before the election.
author: Bethania Palma
vclaim: The U.S. Postal Service is telling voters to send mail-in ballots 14 days before the Nov. 3, 2020, general election.
